name: Raymond Fong Eye Care
description: This practice specializes in LASIK and cataract surgery, with a significant portion of their patient base being of Asian descent, primarily Chinese and Korean. They emphasize culturally relevant and respectful eye care

name: Park Avenue LASEK
description: Dr. Emil Chynn, an Asian himself, specializes in LASEK, a non-cutting alternative to LASIK, particularly for Asian eyes which may have unique characteristics. He has extensive experience with various laser vision correction procedures

name: Manhattan LASIK Center
